feed.title: Noise Mapping
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Noise Mapping

entry.title: Sound event detection by intermittency ratio criterium and source classification by deep learning techniques
entry.summary: Article by Ester Vidaña-Vila, Giovanni Brambilla, Rosa Ma Alsina-Pagès DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/noise-2024-0014

entry.title: Influence of land cover on noise simulation output – A case study in Malmö, Sweden
entry.summary: Article by Karolina Pantazatou, Kristoffer Mattisson, Per-Ola Olsson, Erik Telldén, Anders Kettisen, Soraya Hosseinvash Azari, Wenjing Liu, Lars Harrie DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/noise-2025-0016

entry.title: A review of the studies investigating the effects of noise exposure on humans from 2017 to 2022: Trends and knowledge gaps
entry.summary: Article by Mohammad Javad SheikhMozafari, Soqrat Omari Shekaftik, Fatameh Fasih Ramandi, Mohammad Reza Monazzam Esmaeelpour, Jamal Biganeh DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/noise-2025-0015
